## Two related series

```{r cons inc}
library(fpp3)

us_change |>
  pivot_longer(c(Consumption, Income), names_to="Series") |>
  autoplot(value) +
  labs(y = "% change")
```

## Scatter + line of best fit

```{r lobf}
us_change |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Income, y = Consumption)) +
  labs(y = "Consumption (quarterly % change)",
       x = "Income (quarterly % change)") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```

## Autocorrelation

```{r auto}
us_change |>
  autoplot(Income)
```
